remarks: Restricted quantifier version of Axiom 5 of [Mendelson] p. 69.  This is an axiom of a predicate calculus for a restricted domain.  Compare the unrestricted ~ stdpc5 .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2004.)
statement:
ra5.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
ra5 $p |- ( A. x e. A ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ph -> A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
